contentrichtext.text: {{main|ISO 3166-2}} '''ISO 3166-2:YE''' is the entry for [[Yemen]] in [[ISO 3166-2]], part of the [[ISO 3166]] [[standardization|standard]] published by the [[International Organization for Standardization]] (ISO), which defines [[code]]s for the names of the principal [[country subdivision|subdivision]]s (e.g., [[province]]s or [[state (administrative division)|state]]s) of all [[country|countries]] coded in [[ISO 3166-1]]. Currently for Yemen, ISO 3166-2 codes are defined for [[governorates of Yemen|1 municipality and 20 governorates]]. The municipality [[Sana'a]] is the capital of the country and has special status equal to the governorates. Each code consists of two parts, separated by a hyphen. The first part is <tt>YE</tt>, the [[ISO 3166-1 alpha-2]] code of Yemen. The second part is two letters. ==Current codes== Subdivision names are listed as in the ISO 3166-2 standard published by the ISO 3166 Maintenance Agency (ISO 3166/MA). ''Click on the button in the header to sort each column.'' {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Code ! Subdivision name ! Subdivision category |- | <tt>YE-SA</tt> | {{sort|San‘ā'|[[Şan‘ā']]}} [city] | municipality |- | <tt>YE-AB</tt> | [[Abyān Governorate|Abyān]] | governorate |- | <tt>YE-AD</tt> | {{sort|Adan|[['Adan Governorate|'Adan]]}} | governorate |- | <tt>YE-DA</tt> | {{sort|AdḐāli'|[[Aḑ Ḑāli' Governorate|Aḑ Ḑāli']]}} | governorate |- | <tt>YE-BA</tt> | [[Al Bayḑā' Governorate|Al Bayḑā']] | governorate |- | <tt>YE-HU</tt> | {{sort|Al Hudaydah|[[Al Ḩudaydah Governorate|Al Ḩudaydah]]}} | governorate |- | <tt>YE-JA</tt> | [[Al Jawf Governorate|Al Jawf]] | governorate |- | <tt>YE-MR</tt> | [[Al Mahrah Governorate|Al Mahrah]] | governorate |- | <tt>YE-MW</tt> | [[Al Maḩwit Governorate|Al Maḩwīt]] | governorate |- | <tt>YE-AM</tt> | {{sort|Amrān|[['Amrān Governorate|'Amrān]]}} | governorate |- | <tt>YE-DH</tt> | [[Dhamār Governorate|Dhamār]] | governorate |- | <tt>YE-HD</tt> | {{sort|Hadramawt|[[Ḩaḑramawt Governorate|Ḩaḑramawt]]}} | governorate |- | <tt>YE-HJ</tt> | {{sort|Hajjah|[[Ḩajjah Governorate|Ḩajjah]]}} | governorate |- | <tt>YE-IB</tt> | [[Ibb Governorate|Ibb]] | governorate |- | <tt>YE-LA</tt> | [[Laḩij Governorate|Laḩij]] | governorate |- | <tt>YE-MA</tt> | [[Ma'rib Governorate|Ma'rib]] | governorate |- | <tt>YE-RA</tt> | [[Raymah Governorate|Raymah]] | governorate |- | <tt>YE-SD</tt> | {{sort|Sadah|[[Şa‘dah Governorate|Şā‘dah]]}} | governorate |- | <tt>YE-SN</tt> | {{sort|San‘ā'|[[Şan‘ā' Governorate|Şan‘ā']]}} | governorate |- | <tt>YE-SH</tt> | [[Shabwah Governorate|Shabwah]] | governorate |- | <tt>YE-TA</tt> | [[Ta‘izz Governorate|Tā‘izz]] | governorate |} ==Changes== The following changes to the entry have been announced in newsletters by the ISO 3166/MA since the first publication of ISO 3166-2 in 1998: {| class="wikitable" |- ! Edition/Newsletter ! Date issued ! Description of change in newsletter ! Code/Subdivision change |- | id="I-4" | [http://www.iso.org/iso/iso_3166-2_newsletter_i-4_en.pdf {{nowrap|Newsletter I-4}}] | {{nowrap|2002-12-10}} | Addition of two governorates | style=white-space:nowrap | '''Subdivisions added:'''<br /> <tt>YE-DA</tt> [[Aḑ Ḑāli' Governorate|Aḑ Ḑāli']]<br /> <tt>YE-AM</tt> [['Amrān Governorate|'Amrān]] |- | id="II" | [http://www.iso.org/iso/iso_catalogue/catalogue_tc/catalogue_detail.htm?csnumber=39718 {{nowrap|ISO 3166-2:2007}}] | {{nowrap|2007-12-13}} | ''Second edition of ISO 3166-2 (this change was not announced in a newsletter)''<ref>{{cite web| url=http://www.statoids.com/n0801.html| title=Statoid Newsletter January 2008| publisher=Statoids.com}}</ref> | style=white-space:nowrap | '''Subdivisions added:'''<br /> <tt>YE-SA</tt> [[Şan‘ā']] [city] |- | id="II-2" | [http://www.iso.org/iso/iso_3166-2_newsletter_ii-2_2010-06-30.pdf {{nowrap|Newsletter II-2}}] | {{nowrap|2010-06-30}} | Update of the administrative structure and its alphabetical order and update of the list source | style=white-space:nowrap | '''Subdivisions added:'''<br /> <tt>YE-RA</tt> [[Raymah Governorate|Raymah]] |} ==See also== * [[Subdivisions of Yemen]] * [[List of FIPS region codes (V-Z)#YM: Yemen|FIPS region codes of Yemen]] ==References== <references /> ==External links== * [http://www.statoids.com/uye.html Governorates of Yemen], Statoids.com {{ISO 3166}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Iso 3166-2:Ye}} [[Category:ISO 3166|2:YE]] [[Category:Governorates of Yemen|*ISO 3166-2]] [[Category:Yemen geography-related lists]]
